home.name: Farzan
home.title: Senior Frontend Developer | Full-Stack Engineer
home.description: Welcome to my personal website. I'm a passionate software developer specializing in building exceptional digital experiences. With expertise in React, Three.js, Django, and modern web technologies, I create interactive, performant, and user-friendly applications.
home.portfolioDesc: Explore my work, projects, experience, and technical skills

home.tutorialsDesc: Learn from step-by-step guides on React, Three.js, and more

blog.title: Blog
blog.subtitle: My thoughts and ideas
blog.description: Welcome to my blog! Here I share my thoughts on web development, programming, technology, and my journey as a software developer. I write about the challenges I face, solutions I discover, and interesting concepts I learn along the way.

tutorials.title: Tutorials
tutorials.subtitle: Learn with me
tutorials.description: Explore step-by-step tutorials covering web development, React, Three.js, and more. From beginner-friendly guides to advanced techniques, I share practical knowledge to help you level up your coding skills.
